PropertyList:
XB-70 North American Valkyrie ______________________________________________
} AutoStart/AutoStop
d Open/Close crew door
shift+d (D) Open/Close weapons bay door >
Ctrl-B Drag chutes
shift+e (E) Release bomb
shift+q (Q) Reset view
To reach cruise altitude and speed : - apply full throttle, - "speed with pitch", set the speed to 300 kts and wait until about 38/40 000 ft, - set the speed to 450 kts : you're going to have a short dive, pass mach 1, then resume your climb, (you may pass the mach without diving, it's just easier that way) - wait some minutes, you're going to fly at mach 3.1, at more than 70 000 ft.
Wing tips folding : - necessary to prevent nose-down pitching, as the aerodynamic center of the wing moves backward with speed, - again, be patient, complete folding needs 65s, - first step at mach 0.95 or 400 kts IAS, whichever is lower, - complete folding above mach 1.4.
Flaps : - one position only, beware the high pitching moment (the canards are far ahead the CoG), - only below 270 kts IAS.
